Who is still active here?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Who is still active here?
By Temme on Friday, April 5, 2013 - 08:00 am:

After reading through much of the forum (every post) while bored in work and re-kindling my love for MR2 i've decided to give this website a shot, who is still active here? And up for any general discussion, hints tips etc?

And on a side note - i went on my first expedition to find the paradoxine and found 3 on my first visit - is that a new record?!

Also since reading through much of the breeding advice here i've just got my first gen nagita(?) (Pixie/Jell) past 2 of the major 4, and she's still going strong at 5yrs!


Hopefully (although i don't see how right now)I want to raise a hare from my Nagita to beat the major 4, as these were always the characters i loved raising when I was clueless about MR2, (they'd usually die before 3y/o lol!)

By Silver Latios on Sunday, April 7, 2013 - 06:52 am:

I'm active! I'm actually still a new-ish member(though I've read this site for years), with a story similar to yours. Congrats on the Paradoxine! I haven't gotten around to making a go for it but I know people have tremendous difficulty with it. I also have fond memories of the monsters I went through in my clueless days... Even today I'm still addicted to Zuums but I'm meaning to broaden out and raise some monsters I never have before.
